id: Trudeau says Canadian Officials Have Heard Recording in Khashoggi Killing
paragraph:
November 15, 2018Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau became the first leader to publicly say that his country’s intelligence officials had listened to an audio recording that Turkish officials say is evidence that the journalist Jamal Khashoggi was killed by Saudi operatives.Mr. Trudeau said during a news conference in Paris that Canadian officials have been working with their Turkish counterparts on the investigation into Mr. Khashoggi’s killing. He said he hadn’t personally listened to the recording. However, a Canadian government official...
